desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力を超絶アップ＆残りＨＰが少ないほど、防御力を超絶アップ

dictionary.lore: Nine divine treasures exist enveloped in mystery that only a handful of people are aware of. Their names not only remain in the history of Grand Gaia, but in the history of Elgaia as well, casting a great shadow through the incidents that surround them. The night before the Elgaia Federation was to be established, an independence supporter is rumored to have exclaimed "With this lance I can destroy the world." as if possessed. The lance was never seen or heard of again.

name: 神器イース=カノッサ
